sentence: Faultless as ever lovely staff and a million smiles
Service on all levels is wonderful from the floor butlers to the restaurant staff many of whom knew us after the second day
You will never find a more beautiful hotel this includes facility staff rooms views scenery foods everything
On the other hand the service from Mandarin Oriental was very great
The concierge was helpful navigating us through 3 nights with great dinner recommendations
It is pure luxury in every sense of the word and the staff are so obliging and happy and attentive

Love this hotelHoweve this trip it was not the service as usualThey even forgot my wifes birthday Typically unlike MOBKI hope the lobby is the next to be refurbished the upholstery is goneGet well soon and hope to see you again soon Grand Lady
The restaurants the spa the room service and especially the house keeping are absolutely perfect
You may find good service at other hotels but you will never find the unmatched service this hotel provides
Amazing service and attention to detail
Where else in the world are you greeted by every staff member by name and welcomed home every time as though you were there yesterday
The treatments are very good but the reception area is not big enough
The service levels are exceptionally high
No doubt there must be a highly professional and friendly staff
After all after midnight skytrain service is not available anymore
The staff were all so nice and sweet but it was a bit much
Breakfast being a busy time was even better as the staff handled the queue jumpers with tact and great level of service
I am never disappointed by their impeccable service have stayed in the hotel over 20 years
Too much service noisy rooms
In keeping with the service ethos the butler wishes good morning to each guest as they approach his station which if you have a room nearby can be disturbing

Only flaws were the hard bed really need some decent mattress toppers and issues with some TV channels which juddered and the sound was out of sync with the picturesAs many people note the service is top quality
The facilities and service is 5 star
Who ever is responsible for Customer Service training at the MO Bangkok give yourselves a huge pat on the back
Little bit of advise use the hotel pick up service the BMW 7 series makes you feel like a movie star and the price is worth it even when we went to the clubs we used this service
Service is uneven ranging from amazing double turndown service to a total miss out
Staff are biased in favor of Asian clientele
